array_delete: With this function you can delete a value (or values) from an array at any given position. The function requires you to provide a variable that holds the array, the index (position) in the array to delete from, as well as the number of values to delete.
The variable that holds the array.
The index (position) in the array to insert the value(s)
The above code will delete all the values in the given array from index 0 to index 9.
